title: QuickBird - Freelancer Super-App
description: A comprehensive AI-powered platform for freelancers to manage projects, generate proposals, contracts, and grow their business with intelligent automation. Features include AI-powered proposal generation, time tracking, project management, client management, and payment processing with Stripe integration.
tech: Next.js, FastAPI, TypeScript, Material UI, OpenAI API, PostgreSQL, Stripe

title: AI Teaching Assistant
description: An AI-powered Teaching Assistant that provides automated educator support using LLMs (Llama 3.2:3b) and LangChain for intelligent tutoring and assistance.

title: Floor Plans Image Generation
description: Generates realistic floor plan images from text prompts using GANs, combining Computer Vision and Generative AI techniques.

title: AI-driven Consumer Behaviour Prediction
description: Predicts consumer behavior in real-time to deliver personalized marketing promotions using Machine Learning and Agentic AI techniques.

title: Bias Mitigation for Job Applications
description: Reduces bias in automated job application screening using advanced Machine Learning models and fairness-aware algorithms.

title: Alzheimer Disease Stage Classification
description: Classifies stages of Alzheimerâ€™s disease from medical data using Machine Learning techniques to support early diagnosis and research.

title: USDA Prompt Matching with NLP
description: Matches USDA prompts efficiently using Fuzzy Matching and TF-IDF techniques for data analysis and NLP-driven insights.
